q: Mark Kelly, she was surrounded by a group of women whom she considers both friends and mentors, including New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , Florida Congresswoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz , and House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi . As Nancy Pelosi put it, We saw a little girl power too. Jezebel, Irin Carmon writes about how the women became friends, how it still remains a rarity to be a woman, particularly a young woman, in American government, and how they found in each other support and

he concluded. All of this is true, but replacing Eric Schmidt with Page is not necessarily the answer, said Seth Harris Dalka, a digital strategy consultant and keynote speaker. Ideally, Google needed to bring an executive that understood search and how that related to the businesses that they serve and their customer service, he told the E-Commerce Times. Yahoo( Nasdaq: YHOO), he pointed out, had a go at bringing back a founder as CEO, and it didn't exactly lead to optimal results.
